December 2011 Monthly Mileage

Posted by admin on December 31, 2011 · 1 min read

Another “biggest month ever”!

181 miles this month – that’s 10 more than November despite the fact I’ve started tapering for Houston.

I went on quite a streak, running 13 days straight for a total of 104 miles.

I WON a 5K race (which later turned out not to be 5k, but I still won, darnit!)

I’m finishing the year just under 1000 miles, but most of my miles have been since I decided to give up derby in August (and actually quit in September). I’m pretty sure I will see closer to 2000 miles next year!
